burgers.name: Cheeseburger
burgers.ingredients: 200g beef, brioche bread, cheese slice, pickled gherkin, grilled onion, mustard, ketchup.

burgers.name: Choriburguer
burgers.ingredients: 180g beef, tomato sauce, lettuce, tomato, double cheese and fried egg (a touch of spicy).

burgers.name: Hideout Burger
burgers.ingredients: Brioche bread, double 100% beef smashburger with American cheese, crispy bacon slices, homemade pickled gherkins and our slightly spicy HIDEOUT sauce.
